original_text: And as Joab was besieging the city, he assigned Uriah to the place where he knew there were valiant men.
korean_text: 요압이 그 성을 살펴 용사들이 있는 것을 아는 그 곳에 우리아를 두니

sentences.original_text: And as Joab was besieging the city
he assigned Uriah to the place
where he knew there were valiant men
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그곳에 용감한 사람들이 있다는 것을 알았습니다
